title: Euphoria
overview: Imagine the not too distant future: the government has decided that consumerism is God. Debt has been declared a capitol offense. Enter Melina. She's decided to gamble everything with an experimental new sex drug called U-4. Although seduced by the power of passion, she uncovers the ultimate manipulation and vows to get to the bottom of it. For, in the nightmare that is the future, you'll risk your life for a little Euphoria.
